reviewText:
This six-part mini-series from Anglia TV is a superb introduction to Celtic Christian Spirituality. Your host will visit Croagh Patrick, Iona, Lindisfarne, Clonmacnois(e) and other sacred sites in an attempt understand the historical significance and present appeal of these first millennium Christians. This visual odyssey and spiritual journey (peregrinatio) is one you will not soon forget!
Rob O'Gorman, Director, Celtic Horizons
